summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held in such city on March 5, 1918, the proposition authorizing and indebtedness in the sum of Three Hundred Thousand Dollars ($3000,000.00) by the sale of general negotiable interest bearing coupon bonds in said amount, to pay the condemnation awards for the taking, appropriation, and condemnation of certain property under Ordinance No. 37320, and particularly described herein.
